articles.title: This Diet Could Reduce Your Risk of Dementia by up to 25%, New Study Reveals - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Adopting the MIND diet, even later in life, is associated with a reduced risk of developing dementia. As the U.S. population grows older and dementia cases continue to rise, many people are wondering: can anything be done to prevent this devastating disease? …
articles.content:
A new study shows the MIND diet may reduce dementia risk, though benefits differ across racial groups. Credit: Shutterstock

articles.title: At WWDC 25, Apple should make amends with developers after AI shortfalls and lawsuits - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple has an opportunity to deliver a WWDC that would encourage developers to invest more of their time in the ecosystem.
